text: Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 22. Should any bhikkhu with an alms bowl having fewer than five mends ask for another new bowl, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
๒๒. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด มีบาตรมีรอยร้าวน้อยกว่า ๕ นิ้ว ให้จ่ายบาตรอื่นใหม่เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
22. Should any bhikkhu change a bowl with less than five mends for a new bowl, this entails expiation with forfeiture.
